It worked two ways: in the first hour of the film, it gives off a sense of defeat and apathy; unlikable characters echoing Infinite Jesters lyrics as they relieve their boredom with cigarettes and weights, unable to realise that life is passing them by.

I first saw this one when it was first shown, so I'm not too objective about it.
